name: GameMonkey Script
summary: Learn about .GM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: GameMonkey Script files can be run with the GameMonkey Script engine and edited with any text editor.

description: Script written for GameMonkey Script, a scripting language used for embedding logic into games and other applications; uses syntax similar to the C language and uses concepts similar to the Lua language; can be used for custom software modifications.
